attributes.action: grant loans to persons on benefits trying to start their own small business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present there are no loans or grants readily available to persons trying to set up a small business.As a single mum, I approached my bank who refused as I dont have a perfect credit history and others have turned me down for being on income support. The government want people back to work, so they should lend us the money to do so, rather than us drain the economy sitting on benefit handouts.
